What is Home Adventurers?

Home Adventurers is a series of minigames uniquely utilizing Smart devices (lights and a home assistant)
to immerse you into being in all kinds of adventurous places!

In Boat Game you and your team member try to control a rapid raft,
one of you is a watcher, it is your job to push rocks away from the boat by pushing your phone,
the other player is the captain, it is your job to steer the boat by rotating your phone left and right.

Boat Game is just one of three exciting minigames you can play at a party, or with your partner!
